Text: Re Electric Pwr Conf Natural Gas Infrastructure CommitteeKevin we have not yet had the opportunity to meet as I have not been able to make it to the Committee meetings as Carrie had setup Taking a look at the Agenda I can probably help with items or and would be happy to develop and deliver a presentation or would ensure that a senior representative from Enbridge would do that My natural tendency with my current position in Northern Pipeline Development would be towards the Agenda Item No New Supply Sources but I probably could find a good resource within Enbridge to present some views and thinking on the Infrastructure Debottlenecking item Please let me know what you think wayne I look forward to the Conference and to getting a chance to meet you Hyatt Kevin To KevinHyatt enroncom Hyatt Kevin PM cc Subject Electric Pwr Conf Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee Hi everyone For those of you I havent met personnally my name is Kevin Hyatt I am currently chairing the Natural Gas Infrastructure subcommittee for the Electric Power Conference to be held in March You are receiving this email because you have previously expressed an interest in serving on the committee Attached below is the current subcommittee track agenda with the sessions and each sessions speaking topics The track and topics were developed over the last months with various inputs from committee members and the Trade Fair Group staff Our current challenge is finding speakers for items and highlighted in red If you move your cursor over the topic the comment box will appear outlining in a little better detail what info we are trying to present for the conference attendees I am working on lining up several speakers but as of yet have only confirmed one from Calpine What I need each of you to do is review the agenda think about who you may know who would be a good speaker for the topic then call them to see if they are interested Speeches should last no more than minutes with a QA period afterward If possible please email or call me with your results by Friday Interested speakers will receive a formal invitation from the Trade Fair Group confirming their attendance Thanks for your help Dont hesitate to call me or Carrie Shapiro x with any questions EP NGIxls This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you See attached file EP NGIxls

RE Electric Pwr Conf Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee Cc OK Kevin count me in for Agenda Item No Please advise as to the scope and nature of the desired components for this Agenda Item or perhaps pass my offer along to Orlando and we can then work together to ensure a high quality panel presentation to cover the New Supply Sources wayne Talk to you soon wayne Hyatt Kevin To KevinHyatt cc Carrie Shapiro Email enroncom Subject RE Electric Pwr Conf Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee AM Hi Wayne thanks for the reply It would be great if you could develop something for item I think Orlando Alvarado is having difficulty getting anyone from Williams signed up for it As for item I may have an interested party for that one but Ill keep you posted thanks again kh Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday October PM To Hyatt Kevin Subject Re Electric Pwr Conf Natural Gas Infrastructure Committee Kevin we have not yet had the opportunity to meet as I have not been able to make it to the Committee meetings as Carrie had setup Taking a look at the Agenda I can probably help with items or and would be happy to develop and deliver a presentation or would ensure that a senior representative from Enbridge would do that My natural tendency with my current position in Northern Pipeline Development would be towards the Agenda Item No New Supply Sources but I probably could find a good resource within Enbridge to present some views and thinking on the Infrastructure Debottlenecking item Please let me know what you think wayne I look forward to the Conference and to
